name: Rippling
description:
Rippling is the first way for businesses to manage all of their HR, IT, and Finance — payroll, benefits, expenses, corporate cards, computers, apps, and more — in one unified workforce platform.
 By connecting every workforce system to a single source of truth for employee data, businesses can automate all of the manual work they normally need to do to make employee changes. Take onboarding, for example. With Rippling, you can just click a button and set up a new employees' payroll, health insurance, corporate card, work computer, and third-party apps all within 90 seconds.
features: Hire, pay and manage global talent compliantly
Manage identity, devices and inventory globally
Control company spend around the world
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Accelerate every part of your business

enhanced_description: Rippling is a unified workforce platform designed to manage all HR, IT, and Finance operations, including payroll, benefits, expenses, corporate cards, computers, and apps. It serves as a single source of truth for employee data, enabling businesses to automate traditionally manual tasks across the employee lifecycle. For instance, new employees can have their payroll, health insurance, corporate card, work computer, and third-party apps set up in as little as 90 seconds. This platform aims to maximize HR's impact, strengthen security through identity, device, and inventory management, and enable granular control over company spend globally, thereby accelerating overall business operations.
